summary: Dynamic AI expert with over 10 years of experience in SaaS and FinTech, driving 70% sales growth and leading AI initiatives that increased product efficiency by 40%.

bullets.text: Directed AI innovation initiatives, enhancing product features and expanding market presence by 25% through AI-driven technologies.
Led the development and deployment of sophisticated AI solutions, broadening product capabilities and securing additional market segments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to map AI integration strategies, doubling product efficiency and streamlining operations.
Implemented AI improvements, resulting in 40% increased engagement and operational cost reductions of $500K.
Developed an innovative online insurance platform reducing onboarding time by 40% through elimination of medical prerequisites.
Integrated advanced technologies optimizing user accessibility, slashing paperwork by 80%, simplifying insurance access, and increasing user satisfaction by 30%.
Collaborated on the custom development of a tailored insurance platform, leading to a 30% increase in mobile and web usage rates.
Crafted top-tier web and mobile applications using cutting-edge frameworks, improving customer satisfaction by 35%.
Engaged directly with clients to translate their creative concepts into functional, attractive user interfaces, boosting project success rates by 50%.
Facilitated more informed client decision-making by aligning project goals and providing insightful UX/UI recommendations.
Optimized and released multiple applications, leading to a 25,000+ increase in user base across platforms.

details: Developed a platform significantly reducing legal research time from days to minutes.
Innovative solution tailored for legal professionals, transforming the research process in Uruguay.

details: Enabled 70% sales growth and notable administrative efficiency improvements.

details: Developed a user-centric interface offering a range of insurance products.
Enhanced user engagement through feature-rich, intuitive design.

additionalExperience: Recognized at the National Academy of Engineering, Uruguay with the First Prize for Best Academic Project in 2023 and secured second place at the Universidad ORT Programming contest in 2022.
